description:
If you are a busy entrepreneur or professional, chances are that your brand is not at the top of your list. The only time that your brand takes center stage is when you feel that you haven't tapped into the full potential of your business and you know that it is holding you back.

This course will take you through steps that can be easily implemented to boost your brand experience and build client or customer loyalty. The lessons are full of examples that will have you looking at your business in a whole new light.

• Understand what is branding and how it affects your business

• Learn to assess your current brand

• Learn steps that you can take to improve your corporate brand

• Create an action plan to develop a magnetic brand for your business
title: Corporate Branding To Attract & Keep Customers Wanting More
